traits.name: Fey Step
traits.desc: The Count is unaffected by difficult terrain.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Magic cannot put the Count to sleep.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The Count has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Command Fey
traits.desc: As a member of the Court of Arcadia, the Count can cast dominate monster (DC 13) at will on any fey creature or elf.

traits.name: Now You See Me…
traits.desc: If the Count teleports next to an enemy, he immediately makes two rapier attacks with advantage against that enemy.

traits.name: Tactical Advantage
traits.desc: If the Count has advantage on an attack roll, he deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The Count’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: misty step, hunter’s mark * 3/day: blur, mirror image

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Now You Don’t… (Recharge 4–6)
actions.desc: As a reaction, if an enemy the Count can see makes a successful melee or ranged attack roll against him, he casts misty step.
